attributes.action: Protect Existing Skilled Worker Visa Holders from Retrospective ILR Rule Changes
attributes.additional_details:
1- Prevent breach of trust in UK immigration rules.
2- Avoid unfair disruption to skilled migrants’ lives.
3- Protect families, employers and key sectors from instability.
4- Recognise contributions to economy, taxes, and public services.
5- Uphold legal certainty and UK’s reputation for fairness.
attributes.background: We urge the Govt to protect current Skilled Worker visa holders on the 5-year ILR path. The proposed 10-year rule must not apply retrospectively, as it unfairly disrupts lives of migrants who made commitments based on existing rules, causing uncertainty for workers and employers across the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
